## ViewNodeUpdate interface

An event interface for updated data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ViewNodeUpdate<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./treex.js.viewnodeupdate.data.md) | T | Data after a change happened |
|  [node](./treex.js.viewnodeupdate.node.md) | [ViewNode](./treex.js.viewnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A node where a change happened |
|  [previous](./treex.js.viewnodeupdate.previous.md) | T | Data before a change happened |
